name: Charlie Gun and the Robot Space Cowboys From Hell
name_original: Charlie Gun and the Robot Space Cowboys From Hell
description:
Charlie Gun and the Robot Space Cowboys From Hell is a verbosely-named, wave-based 2d shooter about upgrading your weapon to fend off hordes of monsters.

Some important things to know:
Escape to pause, H to heal.

The game will only save every 5 waves, but once it's saved you can close the program or something and the save will remain.
